channel.title: Can someone help me with this please >:'(
channel.description:
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13218) at client.process(client.java:13202) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45) Game saved for player mike ClientHandler: Client mike disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from FARVER2:1113 Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space Game saved for player zad ClientHandler: Client zad disconnected.
yeh and i can only have 4 ppl on o.o
can someone help me fix this please my offer is a rep ++

item.title: Can someone help me with this please >:'(
item.dc:creator: @afferin afferin
item.description:
@afferin wrote:

Dude, calm down, he’s new, he probably didn’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me with this please >:'(
item.dc:creator: @afferin afferin
item.description:
@afferin wrote:

Just close it, and open runserver/compile again, it’s what I do, and it works.

And open PlayerHandler, and you’ll see something like public static final int maxPlayers = 200 and change that last number to what you want your max players to be, it works for me.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me with this please >:'(
